system.description:
Silk-wrapped parcels of ultra-fine, metallic dust which renders anything it touches invisible. Usually [[/r 5d10]] parcels are found together.

  • Throwing into the air: The dust coats everything in a 10’ radius.

  • Blowing through a tube: The dust coats everything in a 20’ long cone, 15’ wide at the end.

  • Effect: Anything coated in the dust is rendered invisible for [[/r d10]] turns.

  • Invisible creatures: Always surprise others and gain a +4 bonus to AC. (These benefits do not apply with enemies who can detect invisible.)
